document_data.name: Horngate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Horngate''' was the great arched northwestern gate into [[Suzail]], the capital of [[Cormyr]].{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|64-65}}
document_data.Location: The Horngate stood on the northwestern part of Suzail, where the [[Way of the Dragon]] ended and the city's grand [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] began.
document_data.Structure: The arched gateway was topped with apartments, including the home of [[Huldyl Rauthur]], a [[War Wizards|War Wizard]]in service of [[Vangerdahast Aeiulvana]], the Royal Magician, in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/276/The New Adventures of Volo: Cormyrian Contracts|77}}
document_data.Defenses:
The Horngate was guarded by a garrison of [[crossbow]]-armed [[Purple Dragons]]. Each person or group who entered Suzail through the great gate was stopped and asked to report their visit's purpose and to present appropriate paperwork, like Cormyr's adventuring charters.

Just like the [[East Gate (Suzail)|Eastgate]], and the [[Field-Gates]], the Horngate was a citadel-like fortification that offered solid defenses to Suzail's northwest entrance. Its gatehouse maintained a detailed log of known spies and other individuals barred from entering the capital of Cormyr.
